attack(Role) - Method in class ProjectGameVer3.Beserker
 
attack(Role) - Method in class ProjectGameVer3.Cleric
Redefined attack, as the Cleric heals instead of attacking.The function removes all tags, and all parameters are rest to default state.This function is similar to stage revive but to make the game more interactive the function has differnt strings to display.
attack(Role) - Method in class ProjectGameVer3.Hero
Function Attack of a hero needs to check if they are to skip a turn and also it helps to un-tag heroes from the "(goo)" tag.
attack(Role) - Method in class ProjectGameVer3.Monster
This is a simple function of attack where the poison is checked and the opponent gets attacked.

attack(Role) - Method in class ProjectGameVer3.Rogue
The specialty of Rogue is that , a Rogue can poison a monster for 3 turns i.e set poison to 3 .There are more if statements for better string outputs to make the story more precise.
attack(Role) - Method in class ProjectGameVer3.Role
A default function of attack
attack(Role) - Method in class ProjectGameVer3.Slime
This function changes the skip and goo parameter of the victim of Slime.
attack(Role) - Method in class ProjectGameVer3.Spider
The attack of the spider is redefined as the spider can either attack or poison (a 50% chance of each) When attacked an opponent can retaliate but when poisoned by Spider they can't.
attackChoice(ArrayList<Monster>, ArrayList<Hero>) - Method in class ProjectGameVer3.Cleric

attackChoice(ArrayList<Monster>, ArrayList<Hero>) - Method in class ProjectGameVer3.Hero
This function is what displays the choice of monsters for a hero to attack.
AttackMagnet - Class in ProjectGameVer3
Attack Magnet potion which makes the drinker have a greater chance of being attacked(82% chance).
